protocol_name: Transformation of Bacterial Cultures Using Hexamine Cobalt Chloride
protocol_name_html: Transformation of Bacterial Cultures Using Hexamine Cobalt Chloride
guidelines:
Materials:

1) SOB medium

  • 1.0% Bacto-tryptone
  • 0.5% Bacto-yeast extract
  • 10.0 mM NaCl
  • 2.5 mM KCl
  • 10.0 mM MgCl2
  • 10.0 mM MgSO4
  • Prepare the MgCl2 and MgSO4 as 1 M stock solutions and autoclave separately. 
  • Add the MgCl2 and MgSO4 after sterilization of the remainder of the components. 

 

2) SOC medium

  • SOB media, supplemented with 20mM glucose

3) TFB buffer

  • 10 mM K-MES, pH 6.2, 100 mM KCL, 45 mM MnCl2:4H2O, 10 mM CaCl2:2H2O, 3 mM HaCoCl3
  • Weigh out the components. Add the MES to d-H2O and adjust the pH with KOH.
  • Add the remaining components (in order), waiting until one component is in solution before adding the next. Adjust the volume to the final volume. Filter sterlize. Store frozen at -20oC in 15 mL aliquots. 

4) DTT solution

  • 2.25 M DTT, 40 mM KOAc, pH 6.0. Filter sterilize, Store frozen at -20°C.

5) DMSO (Dimethylsulfoxide)

Reference

D. Hanahan.  (1983).  Studies on Transformation of Escherichia coli with plasmids.  Journal of Molecular Biology 166:  557-580.

components.data: Weigh out the components.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Weigh out the components.

components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add the MES to d-H<sub>2</sub>O and adjust the pH with KOH.

components.data: Add the remaining components (in order), waiting until one component is in solution before adding the next.
components.name: Description

components.data: Adjust the volume to the final volume.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Adjust the volume to the final volume.

components.name: Description

source_data.description: Filter sterilize.

components.data: Store frozen at -20°C in 15 ml aliquots.
components.name: Description

components.data: Prepare the DTT solution.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Prepare the DTT solution.

components.data: Add components together and adjust pH as necessary.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add components together and adjust pH as necessary.

components.data: Filter sterilize.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Filter sterilize.

components.data: Store frozen at -20°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Store frozen at -20°C.

components.data: Grow 5 mL of the host cells overnight in SOB media at 37°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Grow 5 mL of the host cells overnight in SOB media at 37°C.

components.data: Inoculate 40 mL of SOB medium with 0.8 mL of the overnight culture.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Inoculate 40 mL of SOB medium with 0.8 mL of the overnight culture.

components.data: Grow to an A<sub>550</sub> of 0.45-0.55 at 37°C (approximately 3-4 hours).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Grow to an A<sub>550</sub> of 0.45-0.55 at 37°C (approximately 3-4 hours).

components.data: Centrifuge the cells in the Sorvall SS34 rotor at 5,000 rpm, 5 min, 4°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge the cells in the Sorvall SS34 rotor at 5,000 rpm, 5 min, 4°C.

components.data: Discard the supernatant.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Discard the supernatant.

components.data: Resuspend the pellet with 12.5 mL of the TFB solution.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Resuspend the pellet with 12.5 mL of the TFB solution.

components.data: Hold the remaining 2.5 mL of TFB for use later.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Hold the remaining 2.5 mL of TFB for use later.

components.data: Chill the cells on ice for 15 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Chill the cells on ice for 15 min.

components.data: Centrifuge the cells in the Sorvall SS34 rotor at 5,000 rpm, 5 min, 4°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge the cells in the Sorvall SS34 rotor at 5,000 rpm, 5 min, 4°C.

components.data: Discard the supernatant.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Discard the supernatant.

components.data: Resuspend the pellet with 2.4 mL of TFB solution.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Resuspend the pellet with 2.4 mL of TFB solution.

components.data: Add DMSO to 3.5% (84µL), mix and chill on ice for 5 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add DMSO to 3.5% (84µL), mix and chill on ice for 5 min.

components.data: Add DTT solution to 75 mM (84 µL), mix and chill on ice for 10 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add DTT solution to 75 mM (84 µL), mix and chill on ice for 10 min.

components.data: Add an equal volume of DMSO as before (84 µL), mix and chill on ice for 5 min. The cells are now "competent".
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add an equal volume of DMSO as before (84 µL), mix and chill on ice for 5 min. The cells are now "competent".

components.data: Pipet 21 µL competent cells per prechilled microfuge tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Pipet 21 µL competent cells per prechilled microfuge tube.

source_data.annotation: One tube will be spread on one plate.
source_data.thread_text: One tube will be spread on one plate.
source_data.body: One tube will be spread on one plate.

components.data: Add the DNA (in as small a volume as possible, 1-2 µL/tube), mix and chill on ice for 30 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add the DNA (in as small a volume as possible, 1-2 µL/tube), mix and chill on ice for 30 min.

components.data: Heat pulse the tubes at 42°C for 3 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Heat pulse the tubes at 42°C for 3 min.

components.data: Add 80 µL of SOC medium per tube and incubate the tubes at 37°C for 60 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 80 µL of SOC medium per tube and incubate the tubes at 37°C for 60 min.

components.data: Spread 100 µL onto each plate.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spread 100 µL onto each plate.

components.data: Incubate the plates at 37°C overnight.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate the plates at 37°C overnight.

components.data: Then chill on ice for 2 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Then chill on ice for 2 min.
